text: Markos Maragoudakis (; born 28 January 1982) is a Greek-Congolese professional footballer who plays for Football League club Ialysos. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo people of Greek descent Category:Greek expatriate footballers Category:Greek expatriates in Cyprus Category:Ethnikos Piraeus F.C. players Category:PAS Giannina F.C. players Category:Akratitos F.C. players Category:Rodos F.C. players Category:Platanias F.C. players Category:Panachaiki F.C. players Category:Aris Limassol FC players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Cypriot Second Division players Category:Association football forwards
title: Markos Maragoudakis
